SRP.Q: On New Users, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 2001 relative to that in 2010 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Casual Users's Average Watch Time levels?

VPR.Q: What is the trend of New Users's Average Watch Time levels?
VPR.A: New Users's average watch time levels show a {stable rising} trend.
